mapper.select: select dynamic_id dynamicId, user_account userAccount, dynamic_login_ip dynamicLoginIp, dynamic_content dynamicContent, dynamic_add_time dynamicAddTime, dynamic_tyle dynamicTyle from dynamic ORDER BY dynamicAddTime DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: insert into dynamic ( user_account, dynamic_login_ip, dynamic_content, dynamic_add_time, dynamic_tyle ) values ( #{userAccount}, #{dynamicLoginIp}, #{dynamicContent}, #{dynamicAddTime}, #{dynamicTyle})
